summary: To create a simplified hotel workout plan for Rohan's upcoming trip to Jakarta to maintain activity levels.
trigger: Rohan Patel informed the team that he would be traveling to Jakarta from July 15th to 19th for all-day meetings.
rationale: Rohan's schedule of 'Meetings all day' suggested his regular fitness routine would be disrupted.
The decision to create a simplified plan acknowledges the constraints of business travel, focusing on maintaining activity rather than peak performance.
Rohan specified he would be staying at The Ritz-Carlton, allowing Rachel to confirm the availability of a gym and tailor the plan accordingly.
